experience.title: Retried
experience.description: Experience Non commission officer 	Indian Air Force 	June 1981 – August 2001 (20 years 1 month) • Service No – 626930F  	Rank – SGT	Effectively managed operations of section/ office and provided overall administration to the section to ensure bottleneck free functioning. • Defined work allocations to the subordinated staff to ensure highest team productivity. • Managed inventory of materials ensuring safe storage, retrieval and regulated movements. Monitored inventory levels of various items and sought replenishments based on reorder levels. • Meticulously maintained office records ensuring complete confidentiality and safety as warranted by the system. • Specialist Vehicle Operator (SVO) / Mechanical Transport Driver (MTD). Complete knowledge of maintenance & driving of right & left hand vehicles on all types of roads. • Acquired comprehensive skills in fire fighting and security management. • Provided leadership to team of section staff and kept them fully charged up to stand up to any call for committed response. Trainings undergone at Indian Air Force :- Year 1981 - 2001 Regularly Undergone Various Training’s Like Specialist Vehicle Operator (SVO) / Mechanical Transport Driver (MTD)., Security, Managements – Office, manpower, Fire, Safety, Trainings Programs to staffs or Other Members , maintenance Of Vehicles, Documents, etc….
